div.p:
ELEMENTARY SCHOOL
65 Krank St.
Albany, NY (map)

MIDDLE SCHOOL
42 S. Dove St.
Albany, NY (map)

img.br: Albany Community Charter School is a community – a family – of learners, guardians, caregivers, and educators. We are a tuition-free, public K-8. But you must apply to join our community.

ul.li: Longer learning day and longer school year.
We emphasize respect and character education in addition to reading, writing and mathematics.
We proudly serve English Language Learners and students who have special needs.

div.a: April 16 Board of Trustee Meeting – Now Virtual
div.p: The Board of Trustees will be holding their monthly Trustee meeting virtually on Thursday, April 16th. If you’re interested in attending the meeting or for more information on how to attend the meeting, please contact Jennifer Brady Director of Finance and Operations at jbrady@albanycommunitycs.org.

3/30/2020 - The latest update from Albany Community Charter School on school closures through 4/17/2020 in response to the Coronavirus/Covid-19 pandemic. Details on the closure, meal plans, and updated academic plans.
In accordance with New York State Guidelines, ACCS will remain closed through April 1. Read the full announcement for information on classwork.

Although there are no confirmed cases among ACCS students/staff of COVID-19 at this time, as a precautionary measure ACCS will be closed for two weeks starting Monday, March 16th through Friday, March 27. The school will reopen on Monday, March 30th. Breakfast and Lunch will be provided each day at our Elementary building for all…
ACCS’s board meeting, originally scheduled for December 19 has been moved up to December 17th at 9:30am at our Dove Street School. Hope to see you there!

div.a: Special Meeting: ACCS Board of Trustees
div.p: The Albany Community Charter School Board of Trustees will hold a Special Meeting on Thursday, November 21 at 12:15 PM at Albany Community Charter School's Middle School Campus for the purpose of considering educational corporation structure.

p.br:
42 S Dove St.
Albany, New York 12202
